name: Soaper Fight
description:
A work-in-progress with a character selection page featuring the Soaper 5 characters from MOE. Used the cute images from MOH's 'Content you can use' segment.' 

An upgraded version of https://suhaimizs.itch.io/fight-covid-19.

Introduction:

A simple game created by Suhaimizs using GDevelop to teach children to clean up their tables after they eat so as to keep the coronavirus away and at bay. It is also a simple gesture meant as a dedication to all educators and students who have been fighting harder ever since the COVID-19 pandemic. 

Instructions:

Aim and shoot the virus as you clean and wipe the table. Remember to sanitise by tapping on the cleansing liquid in the bottle regularly. Also, do check your temperature once in a while. It is almost impossible to lose if you focus and fight on. Share a screenshot of your score with your friends and challenge them to wipe out more of these novel coronavirus .
